channel.title: [317] People Cant connect to my server
channel.description: OK, so people cant connect to my server i port forwarded it and ran a server before but when they try to use my new client it wont log in and says error

item.title: [317] People Cant connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @wwe_justin wwe justin
item.description:
@wwe_justin wrote:

if yours is hamachi , you need them to join your network then and they enter your hamachi ip ingame

item.title: [317] People Cant connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @samtherule samtherule
item.description:
@samtherule wrote:

[quote=“imsokool22, post:4, topic:314149”]is this client ip changing?
second go to google search hamachi and download it then run it and give every1 who wants to play your server ur hamachi network and pass then thye enter your hamachi ip to join ur server.
There u go

::Imsokool22::[/quote]

I dont f*cken want hamachi dumass…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2009, 08:33:28 pm[/size][hr][quote=“relmitos, post:5, topic:314149”]Make sure the server ip is set to your server in the client’s GUI/EGUI or Client class.[/quote]

ty

item.title: [317] People Cant connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Make sure the server ip is set to your server in the client’s GUI/EGUI or Client class.

item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

is this client ip changing?
second go to google search hamachi and download it then run it and give every1 who wants to play your server ur hamachi network and pass then thye enter your hamachi ip to join ur server.
There u go

::Imsokool22::
